name: Ze Framework
short_description:
The framework is designed to handle data submission part and data displaying part separately and effectively. The two process has no relation in actual scenario. So, the framework is designed to handle it same way. There are separate handler classes to handle submission requests, and separate loaders for data displaying request. There are model classes used to carry data from page to handler and from loader to page. Model class can have properties like any primitive, any wrapper, java.lang.String, java.util.Date and any user defined object. Model class can have array properties of any of above type. User defined object property can have simple and array property of any of above type.

Please, do "Browse All Files" to get framework, diagram and examples.

Release 1.1 is compatible with J2EE 6 implementing server.

New post: http://zeframework.blogspot.in/2014/10/configuration-file-for-ze-framework.html

Please, find more information on: http://zeframework.blogspot.com
summary: A powerful but lightweight java framework for web applications
